title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.5 - Times and places for inspecting or copying records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 603.5 - Times and places for inspecting or copying records

State Regulations

Records shall be available for inspection and copying by the
public at the locations designated by the appropriate records access officer on
every day that such office is open for the transaction of administrative
business, between the hours of 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
603.5

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
